channel.title: Data on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Implement Binance Futures PNL Analysis page by Phoenix LiveView
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As Binance doesn’t allow Master Account see MSA account Future PNL Analysis, so we decide to clone Binance Future PNL Analysis page with Phoenix Live View to show all Account Future PNL

item.title: Tracking Bitcoin-Altcoin Performance Indicators in BTC Hedging Strategy
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In recent years, alongside the growth of blockchain technology, the cryptocurrency market has attracted significant attention from investors and traders. These market participants develop strategies based on their experience and knowledge, primarily demonstrated through their ability to analyze market indicators.

item.title: Building better Binance transfer tracking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Binance is one of the most popular Decentralized Exchanges worldwide, so the demand for building Binance-integrated applications is growing daily. My team is also onboarding.

item.title: Reconstructing historical trading PnL: a data pipeline approach
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Executive summary Recovering historical trading profit and loss (PnL) data is a critical challenge for finance and cryptocurrency platforms. When historical records are unavailable, users cannot validate past trading strategies, assess long-term performance, or reconcile discrepancies.

item.title: Transfer mapping: enhancing loggers for better transparency
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is a logger, and why does it matter? A logger is a fundamental component of modern software systems, designed to record system events, user actions, and issues in real-time.

item.title: Visualizing crypto market outperform BTC-Alt indicators with Golang
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Crypto trading is not just gambling. It has strategies. Once traders can take advantage of it effectively, they can earn. One of the most popular strategies in cryptocurrency is Hedge, which is often mentioned with the name Hedge Bitcoin.

item.title: Google Data Fusion
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Google Data Fusion is a fully managed, cloud-native data integration service that enables users to efficiently build and manage ETL/ELT data pipelines.

item.title: Google Dataproc
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Google Dataproc is a fast and easy-to-use, fully managed cloud service for running Apache Spark and Hadoop workloads. It allows users to process and analyze large-scale data efficiently and at scale.

item.title: Managing Dataflow And Sql Database With Concurrency Control
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Some of us had built a game, while others were familiar with e-commerce platforms, D-apps, or even all of these types of applications, and more.

item.title: Materialized View Pattern
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Materialized View Pattern TL,DR; Versus “normal” view A normal view provides ease-of-use and flexibility features, but it DOES NOT speed up data access A Materialized view is the cache of views.
